I have finished following Supply chain courses from Rutgers University.
1. Supply chain logistics
2. Supply chain operation
3. Supply chain planning
4. Supply chain sourcing
5. Supply Chain Management Strategy
Thanks Coursera for giving us such a big opportunity to take!! Thanks BRACU for sponsoring!!
Truly a very good course. It is rigorous and really informative. I have learnt a lot from these courses and I am pretty confident to apply this knowledge in my area of work.
